fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Purify (Night): Prevent a target from being voted the next day. 3 uses, you may use this while dead once if you have charges.
-Mistify (Day): Scramble all votes. Nobody but Unseen will know this. Votes will be randomly distributed on anyone that can be voted. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Mistify can cause an Unseen to be killed by accident.
